Hero.title: I turn ideas into disruptive technological solutions!
Hero.description: I'm a software engineer and architecture specialist (in training) with more than 2 years' experience in web and mobile applications, and I also work as a freelancer.

Aboutme.content: My journey is driven by the relentless pursuit of challenges and excellence, in which I am committed to seeking excellence and making a significant difference in the world of technology. I work as a technology analyst and apply my passion and skills to create impact. My journey is just beginning, and I am always open to new opportunities to grow and make a difference!
